title: Is Pitul Reuter Kevin Severide called "the registered democracy and the supporter of Biden "?
subtitle: Severide was photographed glowing Confederate science into Congressional halls. The allegations that he is a secret supporter of Biden lack much evidence.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Kevin Severide, who carried the Confederate flag to the American Capitol during the attack on the building in January 2021, is registered as a democracy in Delaware.
